verses.verse: Hear <WH8085> this, <WH2088> O priests! <WH3548> Give <WH7181> heed, <WH7181> O house <WH1004> of Israel! <WH3478> Listen, <WH238> O house <WH1004> of the king! <WH4428> For the judgment <WH4941> applies to you, For you have been <WH1961> a snare <WH6341> at Mizpah, <WH4709> And a net <WH7568> spread <WH6566> out on Tabor. <WH8396>
And the revolters <WH7846> have gone <WH6009> deep <WH6009> in depravity, <WH9597> But I will chastise <WH4148> all <WH3605> of them.

I know <WH3045> Ephraim, <WH669> and Israel <WH3478> is not hidden <WH3582> from Me; For now, <WH6258> O Ephraim, <WH669> you have played <WH2181> the harlot, <WH2181> Israel <WH3478> has defiled <WH2930> itself.

Their deeds <WH4611> will not allow <WH5414> them To return <WH7725> to their God. <WH430> For a spirit <WH7307> of harlotry <WH2183> is within <WH7130> them, And they do not know <WH3045> the Lord. <WH3068>

Moreover, the pride <WH1347> of Israel <WH3478> testifies <WH6030> against <WH6440> him, And Israel <WH3478> and Ephraim <WH669> stumble <WH3782> in their iniquity; <WH5771> Judah <WH3063> also <WH1571> has stumbled <WH3782> with them.
They will go <WH1980> with their flocks <WH6629> and herds <WH1241> To seek <WH1245> the Lord, <WH3068> but they will not find <WH4672> [Him]; He has withdrawn <WH2502> from them.

They have dealt <WH898> treacherously <WH898> against the Lord, <WH3068> For they have borne <WH3205> illegitimate <WH2114> children. <WH1121> Now <WH6258> the new <WH2320> moon <WH2320> will devour <WH398> them with their land. <WH2506>
Blow <WH8628> the horn <WH7782> in Gibeah, <WH1390> The trumpet <WH2689> in Ramah. <WH7414> Sound <WH7321> an alarm <WH7321> at Beth-aven: "Behind <WH310> you, Benjamin! <WH1144>"
Ephraim <WH669> will become <WH1961> a desolation <WH8047> in the day <WH3117> of rebuke; <WH8433> Among the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> I declare <WH3045> what is sure. <WH539>
The princes <WH8269> of Judah <WH3063> have become <WH1961> like those who move <WH5472> a boundary; <WH1366> On them I will pour <WH8210> out My wrath <WH5678> like water. <WH4325>
Ephraim <WH669> is oppressed, <WH6231> crushed <WH7533> in judgment, <WH4941> Because <WH3588> he was determined <WH2974> to follow <WH1980> <WH310> [man's] command. <WH6673>
Therefore I am like a moth <WH6211> to Ephraim, <WH669> And like rottenness <WH7538> to the house <WH1004> of Judah. <WH3063>

When Ephraim <WH669> saw <WH7200> his sickness, <WH2483> And Judah <WH3063> his wound, <WH4205> Then Ephraim <WH669> went <WH1980> to Assyria <WH804> And sent <WH7971> to King <WH4428> Jareb. <WH3377> But he is unable <WH3808> <WH3201> to heal <WH7495> you, Or to cure <WH1455> you of your wound. <WH4205>

For I [will be] like a lion <WH7826> to Ephraim, <WH669> And like a young <WH3715> lion <WH3715> to the house <WH1004> of Judah. <WH3063> I, even I, will tear <WH2963> to pieces and go <WH1980> away, I will carry <WH5375> away, and there <WH369> will be none <WH369> to deliver. <WH5337>

I will go <WH1980> away [and] return <WH7725> to My place <WH4725> Until <WH5704> <WH834> they acknowledge <WH816> their guilt <WH816> and seek <WH1245> My face; <WH6440> In their affliction <WH9496> they will earnestly <WH7836> seek <WH7836> Me.
